snippet.title: Transformers Beyond Reality - Available Now on PSVR
snippet.description:
Transformers Beyond Reality is an arcade-style first-person VR shooter available now on Playstation VR. 

Playstation Store Page Link: https://store.playstation.com/en-us/concept/10004935

Join the fight as one of the first human recruits as you step into the world of TRANSFORMERS. Battle alongside your favourite Autobots to defeat the Decepticons and save both Earth and Cybertron!

Find us online:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/TransformersVr
Facebook: https://facebook.com/TFBeyondReality
Website: https://transformers.meta4.games
Discord: https://discord.gg/DZm4EN73K5

TRANSFORMERS and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro and are used with permission. ©2022 Hasbro. All Rights Reserved. Licensed by Hasbro. © 2022 Meta4 Interactive Inc.
